full_summary:
[**Notice Title:** W6895-220081 - High Pressure and Structural Welding]
================================Broadcast Date:** 2023-04-17

**Contract Opportunity Details**
-------------------------------

This is an amended request for Standing Offer (SOA) for High Pressure and Structural Welding services. The notice pertains to contracts between the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Notice Information**
---------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3928481571
*   **Purchase Type:** Standing Offer Agreement (SOA)
*   **Request Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Procurement Category:** Construction of Structures

**Details**
------------

This Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) procurement includes the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials for High Pressure and Structural Welding services requested by the National Defence (DND). Services are to be provided on an “as and when required” basis.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   **Publication Date:** 2023-04-17
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-18 at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-17

**Contract Duration**
-------------------

The contract duration is indefinite and subject to the requisitions received from the DND.

**Location**
------------

The services under this agreement are required at:

Real Property Operations Group – Det Cold Lake
Cold Lake, Alberta

**Submission Procedures**
-----------------------

All interested parties must submit their bids electronically through the CanadaBuys platform. Bids submitted after the deadline of 2:00 PM EDT on 2023-05-18 will be rejected as non-responsive.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries, please contact:

Eric Kwan (SPAC/PSPC)
eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16017611?extsite=MTYwMTc2MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Language**
------------

English and French bilingualism are mandatory for this procurement. Bidders must demonstrate their ability to provide services in both languages.

Note: All notices are subject to the Canada–United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA) provisions.

[**Attachment:** None]
================================

 Accordingly to the government technical requirements. for
